questions.question: You recorded a MIDI bassline on a software instrument track containing an ES2 synth. It is not perfectly in tie. What can you use to alter the timing of your part?
Which button open the left window panes in the Arrange window?
When you drag and drop an audio file from the Finder to the empty space in the main window, what happens?
questions.answer: A new audio track is created named after that file
correctAnswer: A new audio track is created named after that file
options: A new audio track is created named after that file
A warning dialog box asks where you want to save this file
Logic will not allow you to do this

questions.question: You are using a lot of plug-ins and are running out of processing power in your mix, Besides printing the audio of the track, how can you preserve processing power on tracks wit plug-ins that do not need to be automated?
questions.answer: Select Track header components > show freeze and freeze any tack on which you do not need to automate plug-ins
correctAnswer: Select Track header components > show freeze and freeze any tack on which you do not need to automate plug-ins
options: Select Track header components > show freeze and freeze any tack on which you do not need to automate plug-ins
lower the sample rate and bit depth of your project, and upsample when you are done mixing

questions.question: What is an indicator that your show advanced tools check vox is not selected, resulting in beginner mode?
questions.answer: The sides of the main windows resemble wood panels
questions.explanation: Source: This is in practice mode
correctAnswer: The sides of the main windows resemble wood panels
options: The sides of the main windows resemble wood panels
The toolbar is a light shade of green
The main windows is a light shade of green
The project name contains the extra extension .beg

questions.question: You would like to use your cycle range to skip over a section instead of looping it. How do you do this?
questions.answer: Control + Click the cycle range and select Swap Left and Right Locators
correctAnswer: Control + Click the cycle range and select Swap Left and Right Locators
options: This is possible only from the Event List
Go to Edit > Trim > Outside Locators
Control + Click the cycle range and select Swap Left and Right Locators

questions.question: Why would you create an external MIDI track?
questions.answer: to play an attached hardware sampler instrument from a MIDI sequence on your track
correctAnswer: to play an attached hardware sampler instrument from a MIDI sequence on your track
options: to initiate an advanced surround sound mix
to communicate with another studio outside your current Wi-Fi network
to play an attached hardware sampler instrument from a MIDI sequence on your track
to enable higher sample rate audio recording

You are ready to bounce your two-hour movie mix, but you want to bounce the audio as a WAV and an MP3 at the same time. Can this be done?
questions.answer: Yes, choose PCM and MP3 destination in the File > bounce > project or section
correctAnswer: Yes, choose PCM and MP3 destination in the File > bounce > project or section
options: Yes, choose PCM and MP3 destination in the File > bounce > project or section
Yes, set up two separate output faders with the different destinations set in the output
You have to bounce a second time to make a separate file

questions.question: Why is important to save your project before recording audio?
questions.answer: so that the recorded files go into a project folder associated with your project
correctAnswer: so that the recorded files go into a project folder associated with your project
options: to have access to advanced recording modes
to make sure that the Record button can be enabled
so that the recorded files go into a project folder associated with your project
to engage cycle mode more easily

questions.question:
Is this image, what order dows the signal flow through the plug-ins?
![img](./img/2.jpg)
questions.answer: first the compressor, then the EQ
correctAnswer: first the compressor, then the EQ
options: first the reverb, then the auxiliary
first the compressor, then the EQ
it depends on how you set up your audio settings in Project Settings
first the EQ, then the compressor

questions.question: What is the default region length when you open a Drummer track into an empty project?
options: Drummer dows not populate its track with any regions by default
the default is the length of your timeline until the end marker
It changes depending on the Drummer personality

questions.question: What happens when you create a send on an available bus?
questions.answer: An aux tack with its input set to that bus is automatically created
correctAnswer: An aux tack with its input set to that bus is automatically created
options: That audio leaves your interface to an outboard piece of gear
You get an automatic reverb send
An aux tack with its input set to that bus is automatically created
You get an automatic delay send

questions.question: When you load up a patch, what happens?
questions.answer: The channel strip is loaded with any of the following: plug-ins, aux sends, MIDI FX, and/or software instruments
correctAnswer: The channel strip is loaded with any of the following: plug-ins, aux sends, MIDI FX, and/or software instruments
options: The channel strip is loaded with any of the following: plug-ins, aux sends, MIDI FX, and/or software instruments
The main window is saved as a screenset

What dows this image show?

When opening Logic Pro X, you are presented by default with the Choose a project dialog box, how do you change this default behavior?
questions.answer: Click Preference > General > Project Handling > Startup Action and select the action of you choice
correctAnswer: Click Preference > General > Project Handling > Startup Action and select the action of you choice
options: Click File > Project Settings > General and select Song Startup Action
Click Preference > General > Project Handling > Startup Action and select the action of you choice

questions.question: When you open and work in a stock project template, such as Electronic what happens when you click Save?
questions.answer: You can save over the template
correctAnswer: You can save over the template
options: You are focred to use a new project name, since you cannot save over a template.
You can save over the template
